page.title: 02FARMING 1
page.content: { PARDUVINE {--------- } Parduvine is an arable farm of 100 hectares (ha).The farmer plants 45 ha in winter barley , 23 ha in wheat and 32 ha in peas. The barley is sold to a local poultry producer and the wheat to distilleries.The peas are dried on the farm using a eletric grain drier then sold to the Netherlands for cattle fodder. This year the farmer has sold off all his cattle in order to concentrate on crops which he hopes will provide a better return for his efforts. This will depend on reasonable weather at harvest time, especially the pea crop which can be wasted by wet weather.
